marga anka 99 yatathe dhawanaya wana siyalu bas ratha hayilewal margaya osse dhawanaya wiya yuthu wuwath kolambaa sita badulla, bandarawela balangoda pradeshawalata dhawanaya karanu labana udahamulla badulla, bandarawela saha balangoda yana dipo mangin wenath margayaka dhawanaya kirima nisa maginta me apahasuthawa uda wi thibe.mita amatharawa wallawaya, monaragala sita kolambaata hayilewal margaya osse paminena langama bas ratha kolambaa sita ema pradeshawalata nawatha yame di wallampitiya margaya osse dhawanaya kirima da sidu we.wallampitiya margaya osse wenath marga ankayak yatathe langama saha paudgalika bas ratha rasak dhawanaya kere.hayilewal margaya osse nawatha yamata niyamitha langama bas ratha pamanak wenath margawala dhawanaya kirima nisa nugegoda maharagama, pannipitiya, kottawa ha homagama pradeshawala magin saha panagoda yuda hamuda kandawure sewaya karanu labana aabadhitha saha sesu sebaluntada apahasutha rasakata muhuna dimata siduwa thibe.

ee mahatha me bawa anawaranaya kale widesha katayuthu amathyanshayedi eeye (01) pawathi madhya hamuwakata sahabhagi wemini.labana 2013 di shri lankawedi pawathwimata niyamitha podu rajya mandaliya rajya nayaka samuluwata prathama shri lankawe manawa himikam sambandhayen pragathiyak pennum kala yuthu bawata brithanya agamathi dewid kamaran kala prakashayata pilithuru demin widesha amathiwaraya me bawa sandahan kaleya.shri lankawe kisiyam prathipaththiyak nirmanaya karanne saha pawathina prathipaththi sanshodhanaya karanne rate janathawata awashya paridi bawa penwa dun mahacharya ji. el. piris mahatha mewani niyoga nikuth kirimata kisiwakutath nohaki bawath, ewani balapamakata shri lankawa yatath kala nohaki bawath kiya siti.wagakiwa yuthu rajayak lesa warthamana rajaya kisiyam prathipaththiyak kriyathmaka karanne rate janathawata hithakara nam pamanak bawa ki ee mahatha ese nowana prathipaththi kriyathmaka nokarana bawada kiweya.me athara ee mahatha penwa dunne shri lankawe pawathwimata niyamitha podu rajya mandaliya rajya nayaka samuluwata sahabhagi wima sandaha kanediyanu agamathi stefan hapar shri lankawata paminenawada, nadda, yanna kanediyanu thiranayak bawath, eya podu rajya mandalayata ho shri lankawata adala nowana bawathya.eeta amatharawa ema samuluwa shri lankawedi pawathwima sambandhayen ohuge wiruddhathwayak nothibu bawada hethema prakasha kaleya.widesha katayuthu niyojya amathi niyomal perera, amathyanshaye lekam karunathilaka amunugama, janadhipathi madhya anshaye adhyaksha janaral bandula jayasekara ha widesha katayuthu amathyansha sanniwedana anshaye adhyaksha janaral sarath disanayaka mahathwaru athulu pirisak me awasthawata ekwa sitiyaha..
